verses.verse: Be <S%G1096><s%> ye <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3402>followers<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G27>dear<s%> children: <S%G5043><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness,<s%> let it not be once <S%G3366>named<s%> <S%G3687><s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G4241>becometh<s%> <S%G40>saints;<s%>

Neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G151>filthiness,<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> foolish <S%G3473>talking,<s%> <S%G2228>nor<s%> <S%G2160>jesting,<s%> which are not <S%G433>convenient:<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> giving of <S%G2169>thanks.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> ye <S%G2075>know,<s%> <S%G1097><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4205>whoremonger,<s%> <S%G2228>nor<s%> unclean <S%G169>person,<s%> <S%G2228>nor<s%> covetous <S%G4123>man,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> an <S%G1496>idolater,<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Be <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> ye <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4830>partakers<s%> with <S%G846>them.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4218>sometimes<s%> <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> are ye <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> of light: <S%G5457><s%>

(For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G19>goodness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G225>truth;)<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> have no <S%G4790>fellowship<s%> <S%G3361><s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G175>unfruitful<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1651>reprove<s%> them.
For <S%G1063><s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G149>shame<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> of those things which are <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> in <S%G2931>secret.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> that are <S%G1651>reproved<s%> are made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5457>light:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3956>whatsoever<s%> doth make <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5457>light.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> he <S%G3004>saith,<s%> <S%G1453>Awake<s%> thou that <S%G2518>sleepest,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G450>arise<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> shall give thee <S%G2017>light.<s%> <S%G4671><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> ye <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G878>unwise,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4920>understanding<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is.

And <S%G2532><s%> be not <S%G3182>drunk<s%> <S%G3361><s%> with <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G810>excess;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> be <S%G4137>filled<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%>

Speaking <S%G2980><s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> in <S%G5568>psalms<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5215>hymns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5603>songs,<s%> <S%G103>singing<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> making <S%G5567>melody<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>

Submitting <S%G5293>yourselves<s%> one to <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
Wives, <S%G1135><s%> submit <S%G5293>yourselves<s%> unto your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4990>savior<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> to <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G1135>wives<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4983>bodies.<s%> He that <S%G25>loveth<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G25>loveth<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3747>bones.<s%>

For this <S%G473>cause<s%> <S%G5127><s%> shall a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2641>leave<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall be <S%G4347>joined<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1417>two<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3466>mystery:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church.<s%>
